ingredients: 2  firm green mangoes - peeled, pitted, and cut into matchsticks,   +   1/4  purple onion, thinly sliced,   +   1/4  red bell pepper, thinly sliced, 3 sprigs cilantro, or more to taste, leaves removed and stems discarded, 2 tablespoons lime juice, 2 tablespoons fish sauce, 1 tablespoon brown sugar, 1 tablespoon crushed peanuts
nutrition: Total Fat 1g 2%, Saturated Fat 0g 1%, Sodium 568mg 25%, Total Carbohydrate 19g 7%, Dietary Fiber 2g 7%, Total Sugars 16g, Protein 2g, Vitamin C 34mg 168%, Calcium 19mg 1%, Iron 0mg 2%, Potassium 200mg 4%
